sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都有"天气，气候"之意。
means: climate ： 指某一地区常年的气候情况，包括气温、降雨量。还可用作比喻。
weather ： 指某地区具体的短时间内的天气，包括晴雨寒暖等情况。

word_mean: 某一时间某一地区, 以各种气象要素所确定的大气状况。

sentence.Network_en: The weather was unkind to those pipers who played in the morning.
sentence.Network_cn: 坏天气对上午那些风笛吹奏者毫不容情。

sentence.Network_en: Warm weather has attracted the flat fish close to shore.
sentence.Network_cn: 煦暖的气候将比目鱼引到了近海。

sentence.Network_en: The weather forecast is for showers and overcast skies.
sentence.Network_cn: 天气预报上说多云并伴有阵雨。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English weder, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch weer and German Wetter, probably also to the noun wind

entry.def: The weather is the condition of the atmosphere in one area at a particular time, for example if it is raining, hot, or windy.
If something such as wood or rock weathers or is weathered, it changes colour or shape as a result of the wind, sun, rain, or cold.

example.ex: Unpainted wooden furniture weathers to a grey colour...
example.tran: 没有上漆的木制家具会褪成灰色。

example.ex: This rock has been weathered and eroded.
example.tran: 这块岩石经风吹日晒已被侵蚀。

entry.def: If you weather a difficult time or a difficult situation, you survive it and are able to continue normally after it has passed or ended.

example.ex: The company has weathered the recession...
example.tran: 这家公司从经济萧条中挺了过来。

example.ex: The government has weathered its worst political crisis.
example.tran: 政府平安度过了其最严重的政治危机。

entry.tran: 警惕;密切注意；留心观察
entry.def: If you keep a weather eye on someone or something, you stay alert so that you will notice if anything unpleasant happens.

example.ex: Street committees keep a weather eye on the families in their district.
example.tran: 街道委员会留意所辖区域内的家家户户。

entry.tran: 夸大…的困难；对…小题大做
entry.def: If you say that someone is making heavy weather of a task, you are critical of them because they are doing it in an inefficient way and are making it seem more difficult than it really is.

example.ex: Some of the riders in this section made heavy weather of the cross-country race.
example.tran: 这个环节的部分骑手夸大了这场越野比赛的困难。

entry.def: If you say that you are under the weather, you mean that you feel slightly ill.

example.ex: I was still feeling a bit under the weather.
example.tran: 我仍觉得身体有些不舒服。

Sentence.sentence: Unfortunately, it's been delayed due to the bad weather.
To protect themselves against the cold weather.
Good thing, the weather was cooperative this time.
Extreme weather and reckless development arc plotting against the rain forest in ways that scientists have never seen.
change the weather patterns throughout the world
But do economics and finance work in the same way as weather conditions or the movement of planets?

sentences.en: Rocks weather until they are worn away.
sentences.cn: 岩石风化, 直至损坏。

sentences.en: The wind and sea have weathered the rocks quite smooth.
sentences.cn: 这些岩石因风和海水的作用变得非常光滑。

sentences.en: The country had weathered a serious crisis.
sentences.cn: 这个国家平安渡过了严重危机。

jushi.english: We had almost tropical weather last summer.
jushi.chinese: 去年夏天我们这里的天气几乎跟热带一样炎热。
